message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm asking for $100 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $95 is the lowest I can go. This still gives you a good deal, considering the product is worth $120 to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $85?
